data.title: Malstrom's Articles News
data.meta_description: Blue Ocean refers to the book by Harvard Business School titled 'Blue Ocean Strategy'. The strategy is about re-aligning values of the product to not focus on the values competition is about but build on values that competition does not yet revolve around.
